/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, exhibit a modern architectural style, while the trees add a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful backdrop to the scene.
